TreEvo
  • Reference

Intrinsic Character Evolution Models

This function describes a model of intrinsic character evolution. Character change is restricted above a minimum threshold

boundaryMinIntrinsic(params, states, timefrompresent)

Arguments

params

describes input paramaters for the model. boundaryMinIntrinsic params = sd, minimum
states

vector of states for each taxon
timefrompresent

which time slice in the tree

Value

A matrix of values representing character displacement from a single time step in the tree.

References

O'Meara and Banbury, unpublished

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • References

Author

Brian O'Meara and Barb Banbury
